name: Tete-Blocks
description:
The game is a puzzle game where you have to solve block puzzles.

Pick up blocks with red dot on your character and fill grey area with blocks.

Supports controllers with multiple players. Press button on controller to add player in lobby screen.

Keyboard controls:

  •  WASD to move
  • N to pickup and drop
  • M to rotate

XBox controller:

  • Left stick to move
  • A to pickup and drop
  • B to rotate

Playstation controller:

  • Left stick to move
  • Cross to pickup and drop
  • Circle to rotate
